cast: Vanessa Hudgens, Kimiko Glenn, James Marsden, Sofia Carson, Liza Koshy, Ken Jeong, Elizabeth Perkins, Jane Krakowski, Michael McKean, Phil LaMarr
description: Equestria's divided. But a bright-eyed hero believes Earth Ponies, Pegasi and Unicorns should be pals — and, hoof to heart, she’s determined to prove it.

description: A woman adjusting to life after a loss contends with a feisty bird that's taken over her garden — and a husband who's struggling to find a way forward.

description: After most of her family is murdered in a terrorist bombing, a young woman is unknowingly lured into joining the very group that killed them.

description: When the clever but socially-awkward Tetê joins a new school, she'll do anything to fit in. But the queen bee among her classmates has other ideas.

description: After a deadly home invasion at a couple’s new dream house, the traumatized wife searches for answers — and learns the real danger is just beginning.

cast: Maisie Benson, Paul Killam, Kerry Gudjohnsen, AC Lim
description: From arcade games to sled days and hiccup cures, Cory Carson’s curious little sister Chrissy speeds off on her own for fun and adventure all over town!

cast: Abhishek Banerjee, Rinku Rajguru, Delzad Hiwale, Kunal Kapoor, Zoya Hussain, Nikhil Dwivedi, Palomi Ghosh
description: As big city life buzzes around them, lonely souls discover surprising sources of connection and companionship in three tales of love, loss and longing.

description: When his son goes missing during a snowy hike in the mountains, a retired intelligence officer will stop at nothing — and risk everything — to find him.

description: Tired of the small-time grind, three Marseille cops get a chance to bust a major drug network. But lines blur when a key informant makes a big ask.

title: My Heroes Were Cowboys
description: Robin Wiltshire's painful childhood was rescued by Westerns. Now he lives on the frontier of his dreams, training the horses he loves for the big screen.

title: Nightbooks
cast: Winslow Fegley, Lidya Jewett, Krysten Ritter
description: Scary story fan Alex must tell a spine-tingling tale every night — or stay trapped with his new friend in a wicked witch's magical apartment forever.

title: Schumacher
director: Hanns-Bruno Kammertöns, Vanessa Nöcker, Michael Wech
cast: Michael Schumacher
description: Through exclusive interviews and archival footage, this documentary traces an intimate portrait of seven-time Formula 1 champion Michael Schumacher.

description: Join the StoryBots and the space travelers of the historic Inspiration4 mission as they search for answers to kids' questions about space.

title: You vs. Wild: Out Cold
cast: Bear Grylls, Jason Derek Prempeh
description: After a plane crash leaves Bear with amnesia, he must make choices to save the missing pilot and survive in this high-stakes interactive adventure.

title: Kate
cast: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Jun Kunimura, Woody Harrelson, Tadanobu Asano, Miyavi, Michiel Huisman, Miku Martineau
description: Slipped a fatal poison on her final job, a ruthless assassin working in Tokyo has less than 24 hours to find out who ordered the hit and exact revenge.

title: Prey
cast: David Kross, Hanno Koffler, Maria Ehrich, Robert Finster, Yung Ngo, Klaus Steinbacher, Livia Matthes, Nellie Thalbach
description: A hiking trip into the wild turns into a desperate bid for survival for five friends on the run from a mysterious shooter.

title: Blood Brothers: Malcolm X & Muhammad Ali
cast: Malcolm X, Muhammad Ali
description: From a chance meeting to a tragic fallout, Malcolm X and Muhammad Ali's extraordinary bond cracks under the weight of distrust and shifting ideals.

title: The Women and the Murderer
description: This documentary traces the capture of serial killer Guy Georges through the tireless work of two women: a police chief and a victim's mother.

description: Under pressure to continue a winning tradition in American tennis, Mardy Fish faced mental health challenges that changed his life on and off the court.

description: In the wake of the Sept. 11 attacks, a lawyer faces an emotional reckoning as he attempts to put a dollar value on the lives lost. Based on real events.

description: Cassie lives to party... until she dies in a freak accident. Now this social butterfly needs to right her wrongs on Earth if she wants to earn her wings.

title: Final Account
description: This documentary stitches together never-before-seen interviews with the last living generation of people who participated in Hitler's Third Reich.

title: He's All That
cast: Addison Rae, Tanner Buchanan, Rachael Leigh Cook, Madison Pettis, Isabella Crovetti, Matthew Lillard, Peyton Meyer, Annie Jacob, Myra Molloy, Kourtney Kardashian
description: An influencer specializing in makeovers bets she can transform an unpopular classmate into prom king in this remake of the teen classic "She's All That."

description: A special forces operative traveling from London to Paris with his girlfriend takes action when armed, ruthless mercenaries seize control of their train.

title: Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayal & Greed
cast: Bob Ross
description: Bob Ross brought joy to millions as the world’s most famous art instructor. But a battle for his business empire cast a shadow over his happy trees.

title: The River Runner
description: In this documentary, a kayaker sets out to become the first man to paddle the four great rivers that flow from Tibet's sacred Mount Kailash.

title: The Water Man
cast: David Oyelowo, Rosario Dawson, Lonnie Chavis, Amiah Miller, Alfred Molina, Maria Bello
description: Desperate to save his ailing mother, 11-year-old Gunner runs away from home on a quest to find a mythic figure rumored to have the power to cheat death.

title: Count Me In
description: This documentary features some of rock's greatest drummers as they come together in an inspiring rhythmic journey about the power of human connection.

title: Untold: Caitlyn Jenner
description: Caitlyn Jenner's unlikely path to Olympic glory was inspirational. But her more challenging road to embracing her true self proved even more meaningful.

cast: Aishwarya Rajesh, Vidhu, Surya Ganapathy, Madhuri, Pavel Navageethan, Avantika Vandanapu
description: Paranormal activity at a lush, abandoned property alarms a group eager to redevelop the site, but the eerie events may not be as unearthly as they think.

description: When he meets a debt-ridden woman who's caring for her ailing father, a debt collector with a heart of gold sets out to win her love.

description: He lost the love of his life to a pharmaceutical company's greed. Now his daughter is without a mother, and he's without justice. For now.

description: The dark secrets of a seemingly peaceful island threaten to swallow up an orphaned student when he grows close to a mysterious new teacher.

title: Memories of a Murderer: The Nilsen Tapes
description: Serial killer Dennis Nilsen narrates his life and horrific crimes via a series of chilling audiotapes recorded from his jail cell.

cast: Larissa Manoela, Thati Lopes, Bruno Montaleone, David Sherod James, Maiara Walsh, Flávia Garrafa, Kathy-Ann Hart, Ray Faiola, Noa Graham

description: An American tourist goes on the run in Greece after a tragic accident plunges him into a political conspiracy that makes him a target for assassination.

description: In a world where humans and fearsome monsters live in an uneasy balance, young hunter Aiden fights to save his village from destruction by a dragon.

description: After reuniting as middle-aged men, three kung-fu prodigies must set their differences aside and dust off their skills to avenge their beloved mentor.

description: Desperate to save their marriage, a young couple takes a deal and moves into their dream home, but disturbing events reveal the house's troubled history.

cast: Ini Dima-Okojie, Ruslaan Mumtaz, Richard Mofe-Damijo, Joke Silva, Sujata Sehgal, Koye Kekere Ekun, Hamisha Daryani Ahuja, Anee Icha, Ibrahim Suleiman, Osas Ighodaro, Broda Shaggi
description: An interracial romance hits humorous and heart-wrenching hiccups as the couple's parents fight tooth and nail against their relationship.

title: Hate by Dani Rovira
cast: Dani Rovira
description: From his hometown of Málaga, Dani Rovira reflects on human beings’ nonsensical hatred in this hilarious and unfiltered comedy special.

title: Xico's Journey
cast: Verónica Alva, Pablo Gama Iturrarán “Mago Gamini”, Luis Ángel Jaramillo, Lila Downs, Elena Poniatowska, Verónica Castro, Enrique Guzmán, Alex Lora, Marco Antonio Solís, Víctor Trujillo
description: A girl, a dog and her best pal set out to save a mountain from a gold-hungry corporation. But the key lies closer to home, with her sidekick pup, Xico.

title: Red Dot
cast: Nanna Blondell, Anastasios Soulis, Thomas Hanzon, Johannes Kuhnke, Tomas Bergström, Kalled Mustonen, Anna Azcárate
description: Trying to rekindle their marriage and with a child on the way, a young couple on a ski trip suddenly finds themselves stalked by remorseless killers.

title: Squared Love
cast: Adrianna Chlebicka, Mateusz Banasiuk, Agnieszka Żulewska, Krzysztof Czeczot, Mirosław Baka, Tomasz Karolak, Bartłomiej Kotschedoff, Jacek Knap, Anna Smołowik, Helena Mazur, Sebastian Stankiewicz
description: A celebrity journalist and renowned womanizer starts to rethink his life choices after he falls for a mysterious model who leads a double life.

title: The Misadventures of Hedi and Cokeman
cast: Hedi Bouchenafa, Nassim Lyes, Fred Testot, Julie Ferrier, Benjamin Tranié, Hugues Jourdain, Charlotte Gabris, Vincent Desagnat, Nina Kepekian, Hakim Jemili, Bun-hay Mean
description: In Paris, two dysfunctional dealers use family ties to try to boost their small drug business in this crass comedy based on the webseries.

title: Malcolm & Marie
cast: Zendaya, John David Washington
description: As a filmmaker and his girlfriend return home from his movie premiere, smoldering tensions and painful revelations push them toward a romantic reckoning.

title: Space Sweepers
cast: Song Joong-ki, Kim Tae-ri, Jin Sun-kyu, Yoo Hai-jin, Richard Armitage, Park Ye-rin
description: Chasing after space debris and faraway dreams in year 2092, four misfits unearth explosive secrets during the attempted trade of a wide-eyed humanoid.

title: Strip Down, Rise Up
description: In an effort to reclaim their bodies and lives, a group of women explore the intersections of movement and meaning in a powerful pole dancing program.

title: Below Zero
cast: Javier Gutiérrez, Karra Elejalde, Luis Callejo, Andrés Gertrúdix, Isak Ferriz, Édgar Vittorino, Miquel Gelabert, Florin Opritescu, Àlex Monner, Patrick Criado
description: When a prisoner transfer van is attacked, the cop in charge must fight those inside and outside while dealing with a silent foe: the icy temperatures.

title: The Dig
cast: Carey Mulligan, Ralph Fiennes, Lily James, Johnny Flynn, Ben Chaplin, Ken Stott
description: On the eve of World War II, a British widow hires a self-taught archaeologist to dig up mysterious formations on her land, leading to a staggering find.

title: Accomplice
cast: Kurt Sorge, Tom Van Steenbergen, Cameron Zink, Graham Agassiz, Tyler McCaul, Cameron McCaul, Ethan Nell, Hannah Bergemann, Carson Storch, Brandon Semenuk, Veronique Sandler, Nico Vink, Garett Buehler, Jaxson Riddle, Andreu Lacondeguy, Paul Genovese, Paul Basagoitia
description: Traverse the globe with the world's top riders as they pedal through rugged terrain and majestic locations in this visual homage to the bicycle.

title: Penguin Bloom
cast: Naomi Watts, Andrew Lincoln, Jacki Weaver, Griffin Murray-Johnston, Rachel House, Leeanna Walsman, Lisa Hensley, Felix Cameron, Abe Clifford-Barr
description: As a mom copes with the aftermath of a harrowing accident, she finds inspiration from an injured magpie taken in by her family. Based on a true story.

title: The White Tiger
cast: Adarsh Gourav, Rajkummar Rao, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Mahesh Manjrekar, Vijay Maurya
description: The ambitious driver for a rich Indian family uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and become an entrepreneur. Based on the bestselling novel.

title: Outside the Wire
cast: Anthony Mackie, Damson Idris, Emily Beecham, Michael Kelly, Pilou Asbæk
description: In the near future, a drone pilot sent into a war zone finds himself paired with a top-secret android officer on a mission to stop a nuclear attack.

title: What Would Sophia Loren Do?
cast: Nancy "Vincenza Careri" Kulik, Sophia Loren
description: In this delightful short documentary, an Italian American grandmother and film buff finds strength and joy in the life of her screen idol, Sophia Loren.

title: Wish You
cast: Kang In-soo, Lee Sang, Soo-bin
description: Singing and dreaming together, a talented singer-songwriter and a same-aged keyboardist add harmony and love to each other’s lives.

title: Chris Rock Total Blackout: The Tamborine Extended Cut
cast: Chris Rock
description: In this extended cut of his 2018 special, Chris Rock takes the stage for a special filled with searing observations on fatherhood, infidelity and politics.

title: Crack: Cocaine, Corruption & Conspiracy
description: A cheap, powerful drug emerges during a recession, igniting a moral panic fueled by racism. Explore the complex history of crack in the 1980s.

title: Charming
cast: Wilmer Valderrama, Demi Lovato, Sia, Nia Vardalos, Ashley Tisdale, Avril Lavigne, G.E.M., John Cleese, Chris Harrison, Dee Bradley Baker, Carlos Alazraqui
description: On the eve of his 21st birthday, an adored prince must find his one, true soulmate before a spell takes away all love from his kingdom.

title: Stuck Apart
cast: Engin Günaydın, Haluk Bilginer, Binnur Kaya, Öner Erkan, İrem Sak, Fatih Artman, Gülçin Santırcıoğlu, İlker Aksum, Hülya Duyar, Göktuğ Yıldırım, Helin Kandemir
description: Entrenched in a midlife crisis, Aziz seeks solace from his mundane job, lonesome friends and rowdy family while pretending to have his act together.

title: The Minimalists: Less Is Now
description: They've built a movement out of minimalism. Longtime friends Joshua Fields Millburn and Ryan Nicodemus share how our lives can be better with less.

title: What Happened to Mr. Cha?
cast: Cha In-pyo, Cho Dal-hwan, Song Jae-ryong
description: With the peak of his career long behind him, an actor clings to his past glory — until a sudden wake-up call forces him to face who he's become.
